org.itemscript.core.foundries
Interface JsonFoundry<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The supertype of the types that this foundry will create.
All Known Implementing Classes:
ItemscriptFoundry
public interface JsonFoundry<T>

A JsonFoundry is a class that facilitates the creation of instance objects. It contains a map of JsonFactory objects. The right factory is found for a JsonObject, and that factory is used to create a Java object.

Author:
Jacob Davies
jacob@itemscript.org

Method Detail

create

T create(JsonValue parameters)
Create a new object using the supplied JsonValue as a parameter. If the supplied value is a JsonString, the value will be used as a name to look up the right factory. If the supplied value is a JsonObject, a key in the JsonObject will be used to find the right factory.

Parameters:
parameters - The parameters for creating an object.
Returns:
The newly created object.

create

T create(java.lang.String name)
Create an instance of an object using the supplied name to find the factory. No parameters will be supplied to the factory.

Parameters:
name - The name used to find the right factory.
Returns:
The newly created object.

create

T create(java.lang.String name,
         JsonObject params)
Create an instance of an object using the supplied name to locate the factory. The given parameters will be supplied to the factory.

Parameters:
name - The name used to find the right factory.
params - The params specifying the object to create.
Returns:
The newly created object.

put

void put(FactoryName<T> factoryName)
Put a FactoryName into this foundry.

Parameters:
factoryName - The factory to be put in this foundry.

put

void put(java.lang.String name,
         JsonFactory<T> factory)
Put a JsonFactory into this foundry.

Parameters:
name - The name of the factory.
factory - The factory to be put in this foundry.

put

void put(java.lang.String name,
         JsonValue factoryObject)
Put a JsonObject as a factory.

Parameters:
name - The name of the factory.
factoryObject - The JsonObject describing the factory.
